analyzed: c anvayam āpādayati
pratiṣedha niṣedhasya vidhāna rūpa tvāt

original: asataḥ sapakṣān na nivṛttir ity asapakṣa eva nāstīti cet* /
analyzed: asataḥ sapakṣāt na nivṛttiḥ iti a sapakṣaḥ eva na asti iti ced

original: neti saiva nivṛtter nirvṛttiḥ asataḥ katham iṣṭā /
analyzed: na iti sā eva nivṛtteḥ nirvṛttiḥ asataḥ katham iṣṭā
abhāva pratiṣedhaḥ hi
asati api asti

original: bhāvapratiṣedhas tu na saṃbhavatīty askhalitaprajño devānāṃpriyo yas tadviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ necchati /
analyzed: bhāva pratiṣedhaḥ tu na saṃbhavati iti a skhalita prajñaḥ devānām priyaḥ yaḥ tad viṣayam pratiṣedham na icchati
asat abhāvaḥ iti ca vyavaharati
nirloṭhitaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ asati nāstitā iti
artha antare
tena na iha pratanyate

original: na cāsann ātmā sattāsādhanavṛtteḥ sandigdhaḥ syāt* /
analyzed: na ca asān ātmā sattā sādhana vṛtteḥ sandigdhaḥ syāt
na ca pareṇa tathā upagataḥ iti
apramāṇāt abhyupagamāt tathā eva bhavati
atiprasaṅgāt

original: 4: na copagamabalena sapakṣāsapakṣau vyavasthāpya pramāṇapravartanaṃ yuktam* /
analyzed: na ca upagama balena sapakṣa asapakṣau vyavasthāpya pramāṇa pravartanam yuktam
evam hi āgama siddhaḥ ātmā syāt
na anumāna siddhaḥ
tasmāt avyatireke api asataḥ
sapakṣāt vyatirekaḥ sandigdhaḥ
syāt prāṇa ādīnām
ātmanaḥ sandehāt
atas eva vipakṣāt api
ekatra hi niyame siddhe anya nivartanam

original: v1: sidhyet* / anyathā kvacid dṛṣṭe 'bhāvasidhāv api syād evādṛṣṭe saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sidhyet anyathā kvacid dṛṣṭe abhāva sidhau api syāt eva adṛṣṭe saṃśayaḥ

original: tathā hy asakalavyaktibhedavyāpino 'py arthāḥ kecit tajjātisaṃbhavino dṛṣṭāḥ pārthivālohalekhyavat* /
analyzed: tathā hi a sakala vyakti bheda vyāpinaḥ api arthāḥ kecid tad jāti saṃbhavinaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ pārthiva āloha lekhya vat
virodhasya ca adṛṣṭeḥ saṃdeha
eva nairātmyena prāṇa ādīnām ukta lakṣaṇasya virodhasya asiddheḥ
sandigdhaḥ nairātmyāt vyatirekaḥ

original: ātmapratiniyame hi tatkāryātmatayā prāṇādīnāṃ nairātmyena saha virodhaḥ
analyzed: ātma pratiniyame hi tad kārya ātmatayā prāṇa ādīnām nairātmyena saha virodhaḥ

original: 3: syāt* / sa ca na sidhyatīty uktam* /
analyzed: syāt sa ca na sidhyati iti uktam

original: astu nāma nirātmakebhyo vyatirekaḥ prāṇādīnāṃ tadbhāve ca nairātmyavyāvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: astu nāma nirātmakebhyaḥ vyatirekaḥ prāṇa ādīnām tad bhāve ca nairātmya vyāvṛttiḥ
tathā api na anairātmyāt ātmā jīvat śarīre sidhyati
yena ayam na vyatirekasya abhāvam
bhāvam icchati
yathā vyatireka abhave api sapakṣe prāṇa ādiḥ na iṣṭaḥ
sapakṣa avyatirekī ced hetuḥ hetuḥ atas anvayī
na anvaya vyatirekī ced anairātmyam na sātmakam
iti saṃgraha ślokaḥ
na prāṇa ādi saṃbhavena nairātmya vyāvartanāt ātma gati
kim tarhi vidhi mukhena eva prāṇa ādayaḥ
